# iosxe_interface_isis (Data Source)

This data source can read the Interface ISIS configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "iosxe_interface_isis" "example" {
  type = "Loopback"
  name = "100"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `type` (String) Interface type

### Optional

- `device` (String) A device name from the provider configuration.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The path of the retrieved object.
- `ipv4_metric_levels` (Attributes List) Configure IS-IS metric for interface (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--ipv4_metric_levels))

<a id="nestedatt--ipv4_metric_levels"></a>
### Nested Schema for `ipv4_metric_levels`

Read-Only:

- `level` (String) IS-IS level (level-1 or level-2)
- `value` (Number) Metric value (1-16777214)
